Good evening, Northmor Elementary Families!

Thank you all for your patience and cooperation as we navigate all these changes together! Today was a great 1st day of school! We are thrilled to be back in the building. Here are a couple of reminders to help us continue to move in a positive direction:

1. When dropping off in the morning please pull all the way to the end. Make sure your student(s) are ready to get out of the vehicle. As soon as you have stopped they may get out and enter either door they need to go in. Drop and go!

As always, thank you for choosing Northmor Local Schools. Fell free to reach out if you have any questions, concerns or helpful suggestions!

Sincerely,
Amanda Albert
Proud Principal, Northmor Elementary
aalbert@knightpride.org

A quick reminder about Pioneer weather-related closings and delays as well as what to do when Pioneer's calender is different from your home school calendar-

-If your home school is closed due to reasons other than inclement weather but Pioneer is open, report to Pioneer at the usual start time. This includes holidays, breaks and inservice days. Your absence will be considered unexcused if you do not come to school. Check with your home school about transportation.

-If your home school is closed due to inclement weather, do not report to Pioneer.

-If your home school is open but Pioneer is closed-stay home! If Pioneer is on a 2-hour delay-report to Pioneer by 10:10.

Please check with your home school in advance regarding possible transportation changes during delays.
If in doubt about whether to come to school or stay home, call Pioneer-419.347.7744.

-If your home school is closed due to reasons other than inclement weather but Pioneer is open, report to Pioneer at the usual start time. This includes holidays, breaks and inservice days. Your absence will be considered unexcused if you do not come to school. Check with your home school about transportation.

-If your home school is closed due to inclement weather, do not report to Pioneer.

-If your home school is delayed due to inclement weather, report to Pioneer at the delayed start time. If it is a 2-hour delay you will be counted tardy after 10:10.

-If your home school is open but Pioneer is closed-stay home! If Pioneer is on a 2-hour delay-report to Pioneer by 10:10.

Please check with your home school in advance regarding possible transportation changes during delays.
If in doubt about whether to come to school or stay home, call Pioneer-419.347.7744.
